description: As i have ADHD, decision making can be hard. seeing as i dont have the money to buy an actual 8 ball, this is perfect.
summary: Great toy and tool for people who cant make up their mind

description: Your app needs to follow system theme, other than that I have used it to make important life altering choices. I am now a monk living in nepal without electricity (so this is my last comment), I heat myself with the litle wood I found in the mountains, thankfully protecting myself from the cold is easy with the 500kg of sheep wool I sold my house to get. I can't thank you enough! /s
